caption.title: Eukaryotic Initiation Factor (eIF) genes associated with CHIKV RNA levels.
caption.p: (a) Representation of the negative correlation of eIF genes with CHIKV RNA levels (inverse of Ct). (b) Network constructed with eIF genes correlating with CHIKV RNA levels and integrated with PPI data. The NetworkAnalyst tool (InnateDB PPIs; First Order) was used to construct the network and the Gephi program was used for visualization. The color of the nodes illustrates whether the correlation between gene expression and CHIKV RNA levels is positive (red) or negative (blue).
